title: Expandable Tray: start with less slots and increase at carousel
body:
To prevent the "bug" that you can have one more champion in play after carousel if your tray is full, have they tray start with, for example, 7 slots at the begining, then increase by one size at carousel.

Basically this would allow the player to have more champions as the game progress and would prevent the game from adding excess champions on the game.

replies.body: Another option would be to have a queue to the side of the bench, essentially a waiting zone to jump on the bench once it's clear.  It wouldn't be the same as expanding the bench, because it would be impossible to place a champion on there yourself, and they would not interact with the board or bench (IE wouldn't combine with either until the champ jumped on the bench).
